attributes.action: Bring in Medical and Military Aid to the Syrian civilians
attributes.additional_details: The Chemical Attack yesterday innocent civilians were exposed to the gasses Chlorine and Sarin. Production and stockpiling of Sarin was outlawed as of April 1997 by the Chemical Weapons Convention of 1993, so why in 2017 are there innocent people dying from this and yet still the UK are doing nothing to help.The war has been going on for 6 years now with no clear ending in sight. So the only way that we can ensure that no more innocent people die is that if we give our aid and help.
attributes.background: The Syrian civil war has killed over 321,00 people. Yesterday it came to light that there was a chemical attack on the Idlib province of Syria killing 100 people with an expect 20 to be helpless children.The use of illegal chemical weapons without any back lash from the western world.
